comment.text: The translation key "OriginalFormat" is used to display the original format when a file has a custom format or is an image. It appears in the download dialog box and will be displayed if the file does not have a specified single document format.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian (Cyrillic) translation 'Оригинални формат' translates to 'Original formats' in English, not 'Original format'. It's in plural form.
While 'Orijinal tür' is a literal translation, 'format' often implies a structure or arrangement. A more accurate translation would capture this nuance.
